metadata.title: CVE-2020-11558 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC 0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. audio_sample_entry_Read in isomedia/box_code_base.c does not properly decide when to make gf_isom_box_del calls. This leads to various use-after-free outcomes involving mdia_Read, gf_isom_delete_movie, and gf_isom_parse_movie_boxes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ccextractor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
gpac package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
